label: ProductCharacteristic
comment: A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.

datatypeProperties.comment: A condition applicable to this product characteristic.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A code specifying the content type of this product characteristic.
A code specifying a measurement method for this product characteristic.
The code specifying the value of this product characteristic.
A textual description of a target market for this product characteristic.
A value, expressed as text, for this document characteristic.
A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.
A date, time, date time or other date time value for this document characteristic.
The value for this metric characteristic expressed as an indicator.
A defined way of performing something.
A value, expressed as a number, for this document characteristic.
A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.
A row, line or series, commonly used to express the difference between lowest and highest values.
Permissible limit or limits of variation that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.

referencedBy.comment: A characteristic applicable to this trade product.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
